Name: What are the different methods to add task in Churn360?

Languages.Title: What are the different methods to add task in Churn360?
Languages.Content:
Creating and following tasks are a must do activity to to attain a certain milestone in Churn360. There are diffrent methods in Churn360 from which you can add tasks in Churn360.


### Method 1
### Workspace-Tasks

A CSM can monitor a range of daily duties associated with each customer using Workspace-Tasks. Tasks could be classified and given Priorities, Due Dates, and Status. 

![1_Screenshot_Tasks](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/1_Screenshot_Tasks.png){height="" width=""}

#### How to add a new task from Workspace

1. Login to your Churn360 account 
2. Click on **Workspace** from the leftside navigation bar 
3. Click on **Tasks** 
4. Select **'**+**'** (**Add New Task**) 
5. Type the customer name on the search bar 
6. Click on the 
7. Choose **Task Due Date**, **Assigned To (CSM)**,** Category**, **Priority**, and **Status** from the drop-down menus (select all mandatory fields).
8. Click on **Save**.

 :::(Info) (Note)
*  The saved Task should come under the appropriate Status (**Not Started/ In Progress**) in Workspace.
*  Task with the due date for the current date is displayed under **Today** tab   
* The Due Date is highlighted in red on tasks that are past due as a warning.
* A task can be reassigned by a CSM from the "Assigned To" field to another CSM. After reassignment, it appears on that CSM's Work list. (Thus, this CSM User is unable to view it.)
* The CSM can delete an existing task.
> For example, If any task is over-due it reflects under the Today’s tab with a label to indicate the same.
* Any changes made to a task will be shown as history in the task window itself.
 :::
 
 ![image.png](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/image%2882%29.png){height="" width=""}


 ### Method 2
#### Adding New Task from Individual Customer Page:
1. Navigate to the **Homepage dashboard** 
2. Click on **Customers**
3. Click on the intended individual customer
4. On the Header of the page, Click on the **more icon**(**⋮**), and Add Task will be present under it.
5. Click on **Add Task**(This opens the Add task blade)
6. Enter all the details and click on Save(The added task can be viewed on workspace-Tasks)

![4_Newscreenshot_Add-Task_Individual_customer_page](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/4_Newscreenshot_Add-Task_Individual_customer_page.png){height="" width=""}

 :::(Info) (Note:)
In the Individual customer page, you can also add tasks from the **task tab** in the individual customer page as shown below.

![3_Screenshot_Task_tab_individual_customer_page](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/3_Screenshot_Task_tab_individual_customer_page.png){height="" width=""}

:::

 ### Method 3
#### Adding Task from Plays:
You can add task from an existing play from the individual customer page.

1. Navigate to the **Plays tab** in the individual customer page
2. Click on **Add Milestone** and create one. Click on **Add Activity**
3. Create Activity Type as “**Task**” and assign it to **CSM**
4. The Created Task should come up in the Workspace section, and should reflect in the Tasks Due Tile of the Individual Customer


 
![4_Newscreenshot_methods_to_add_task\(1\)](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/4_Newscreenshot_methods_to_add_task%281%29.png){height="" width=""}

:::(Info) (Note:)
You can also add tasks from **Settings** → **Configurations** → **Plays** → **Add milestone**; You can add it under **Add activity** as shown below.

![2_Plays_configuration_add_tasks](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_Plays_configuration_add_tasks.png){height="" width=""}


:::
### Method 4
#### Adding Task from Emails:
You can also add tasks from email section under workspace module, navigate to **Settings** → **Workspace** → **Emails** → **Inbox** → **Email message view** → **Create task**

![3_Screenshot_Task_tab_individual_customer_page](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/3_Screenshot_Task_tab_individual_customer_page.png){height="" width=""}
